trans-unit.source: Exercise – PQM Processing on Job Budget Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – PQM Processing on Job Budget Calculation

trans-unit.source: Create a project that uses item D-7014 in the Job Budget Calculation. Then use the PQM to determine the best vendor from which to purchase 10 units of this item.

seg-source.mrk: Create a project that uses item D-7014 in the Job Budget Calculation.
Then use the PQM to determine the best vendor from which to purchase 10 units of this item.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This exercise uses the setup described in the topic <MadCap:xref href="PQM Setup.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: This exercise uses the setup described in the topic <MadCap:xref href="PQM Setup.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Create PQM for Item D-7014

seg-source.mrk: Create PQM for Item D-7014

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a PQM for item D-7014:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create a PQM for item D-7014:

trans-unit.source: On the navigation pane, click cc|project > Jobs > Jobs.

seg-source.mrk: On the navigation pane, click cc|project > Jobs > Jobs.

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the job, and then click Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the job, and then click Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: In the Job Budget Calculation page, select the line for item D-7014 and then click Navigate > Create in the PQM menu group.

seg-source.mrk: In the Job Budget Calculation page, select the line for item D-7014 and then click Navigate > Create in the PQM menu group.

trans-unit.source: : Creating PQM for item D-7014 on Job Budget Calculation line

seg-source.mrk: : Creating PQM for item D-7014 on Job Budget Calculation line

trans-unit.source:
Notice that the No. and Description fields are populated in the General FastTab and the Lines FastTab contains the following information from the Job Budget Calculation line:
  • Item number and description
  • Quantity
  • Vendor No.
  • Unit Cost
  • Order Date
  • Total Direct Cost

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the No.
and Description fields are populated in the General FastTab and the Lines FastTab contains the following information from the Job Budget Calculation line:
• Item number and description
• Quantity
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Vendor No.
• Unit Cost
• Order Date
• Total Direct Cost

trans-unit.source: : PQM created from Job Budget Calculation line

seg-source.mrk: : PQM created from Job Budget Calculation line

trans-unit.source: Click Navigate > Assigned Vendors.

seg-source.mrk: Click Navigate > Assigned Vendors.

trans-unit.source:
Enter the following Lead Time Calculations:
  • Vendor 60000, Lead Time Calculation = 21D
  • Vendor 61000, Lead Time Calculation = 28D
  • Vendor 62000, Lead Time Calculation = 2W

seg-source.mrk: Enter the following Lead Time Calculations:
• Vendor 60000, Lead Time Calculation = 21D
• Vendor 61000, Lead Time Calculation = 28D
• Vendor 62000, Lead Time Calculation = 2W

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Assigned Vendors page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Assigned Vendors page.

trans-unit.source:
Click Actions > Assigned Vendors > Copy from Header to Lines.
Notice that the value of Assigned Vendors is 3 on the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Click Actions > Assigned Vendors > Copy from Header to Lines.
Notice that the value of Assigned Vendors is 3 on the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: : PQM page with header and line information

seg-source.mrk: : PQM page with header and line information

trans-unit.source: Create Purchase Quotes for PQM Lines

seg-source.mrk: Create Purchase Quotes for PQM Lines

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the purchase quotes for the PQM lines:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the purchase quotes for the PQM lines:

trans-unit.source: On the Actions tab, click Create Purch. Quotes.

seg-source.mrk: On the Actions tab, click Create Purch.
Quotes.

trans-unit.source:
On the ribbon, click Show Matrix.
Notice that the price is populated for each quote, based on the purchase price of 10 units of item D-7014.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Show Matrix.
Notice that the price is populated for each quote, based on the purchase price of 10 units of item D-7014.

trans-unit.source: : PQM Placing Matrix, quotes with no pricing

seg-source.mrk: : PQM Placing Matrix, quotes with no pricing

trans-unit.source: Click Close to close the PQM Placing Matrix page and then click OK to return to the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: Click Close to close the PQM Placing Matrix page and then click OK to return to the PQM page.

trans-unit.source:
In the Lines FastTab, notice that the:
  • Status Created field = Yes
  • Status Verified, Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = No

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, notice that the:
• Status Created field = Yes
• Status Verified, Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = No

trans-unit.source: : Status fields updated on PQM Lines

seg-source.mrk: : Status fields updated on PQM Lines

trans-unit.source: Change Quote Status

seg-source.mrk: Change Quote Status

trans-unit.source: Depending on business processes, the status of each quote can be changed to Verified once the quotes are validated by the vendors. To do so, follow these steps:

seg-source.mrk: Depending on business processes, the status of each quote can be changed to Verified once the quotes are validated by the vendors.
To do so, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, click the value in the Status Created field to open the PQM Vendors page.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, click the value in the Status Created field to open the PQM Vendors page.

trans-unit.source: : PQM Vendors with quote Status = Created

seg-source.mrk: : PQM Vendors with quote Status = Created

trans-unit.source: For each quote, change the Status to Verified.

seg-source.mrk: For each quote, change the Status to Verified.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the PQM Vendors page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the PQM Vendors page.

trans-unit.source:
If necessary, refresh the PQM page and notice that the:
  • Status Verified field = Yes
  • Status Created, Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = No

seg-source.mrk: If necessary, refresh the PQM page and notice that the:
• Status Verified field = Yes
• Status Created, Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = No

trans-unit.source: : Status fields updated on PQM Lines

seg-source.mrk: : Status fields updated on PQM Lines

trans-unit.source: Place Best Quote

seg-source.mrk: Place Best Quote

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to place the best quote:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to place the best quote:

trans-unit.source: Based on the price and delivery date, the quote for vendor 62000 should be chosen.

seg-source.mrk: Based on the price and delivery date, the quote for vendor 62000 should be chosen.

trans-unit.source: Open the PQM Placing Matrix page (Home > Purchase Quotes Matrix > Show Matrix).

seg-source.mrk: Open the PQM Placing Matrix page (Home > Purchase Quotes Matrix > Show Matrix).

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Placing.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Placing.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to select all lines for placement.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to select all lines for placement.

trans-unit.source: In the PQM Placing page, allow the system to select the best price (which will be vendor 62000). Alternatively, enter 62000 in the Vendor No. field.

seg-source.mrk: In the PQM Placing page, allow the system to select the best price (which will be vendor 62000).
Alternatively, enter 62000 in the Vendor No.
field.

trans-unit.source: In the Options FastTab, select the Update Source Data check box.

seg-source.mrk: In the Options FastTab, select the Update Source Data check box.

trans-unit.source: : Settings on the PQM Placing page

seg-source.mrk: : Settings on the PQM Placing page

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source:
In the PQM Placing Matrix page, notice that the:
  • Assigned check box is selected
  • Values are cleared for vendors 60000 and 61000

seg-source.mrk: In the PQM Placing Matrix page, notice that the:
• Assigned check box is selected
• Values are cleared for vendors 60000 and 61000

trans-unit.source: : PQM Placing Matrix, quote assigned for vendor 62000

seg-source.mrk: : PQM Placing Matrix, quote assigned for vendor 62000

trans-unit.source: Click Close to close the PQM Placing Matrix page and then click OK to return to the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: Click Close to close the PQM Placing Matrix page and then click OK to return to the PQM page.

trans-unit.source:
In the Lines FastTab, notice that the:
  • Status Created and Status Verified fields = No
  • Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = Yes
  • Placing Vendor No. = 62000
  • Placing Unit Cost = 48.50 (direct unit cost from placed purchase quote)
  • Difference Unit Cost = -1.50 (Source Unit Cost - Placing Unit Cost)
  • Assigned check box is selected
  • Source Status = Updated (due to Update Source Data check box selected)

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, notice that the:
• Status Created and Status Verified fields = No
• Status Placed and Status Not Placed fields = Yes
• Placing Vendor No.
• Placing Unit Cost = 48.50 (direct unit cost from placed purchase quote)
• Difference Unit Cost = -1.50 (Source Unit Cost - Placing Unit Cost)
• Assigned check box is selected
• Source Status = Updated (due to Update Source Data check box selected)

trans-unit.source: : Status and placing fields updated on PQM Lines

seg-source.mrk: : Status and placing fields updated on PQM Lines

trans-unit.source:
Click the value in the Status Placed field.
Notice that the quote for vendor 62000 appears.

seg-source.mrk: Click the value in the Status Placed field.
Notice that the quote for vendor 62000 appears.

trans-unit.source: Go back to the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: Go back to the PQM page.

trans-unit.source:
Click the value in the Status Not Placed field.
Notice that the quotes for vendors 60000 and 61000 appear.

seg-source.mrk: Click the value in the Status Not Placed field.
Notice that the quotes for vendors 60000 and 61000 appear.

trans-unit.source: : Placed quote for vendor 62000 and Not Placed quotes for vendors 60000 and 61000

seg-source.mrk: : Placed quote for vendor 62000 and Not Placed quotes for vendors 60000 and 61000

trans-unit.source: Go back to the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: Go back to the PQM page.

trans-unit.source: If no further changes need to be made, click Finish on the ribbon to complete the processing for this PQM.

seg-source.mrk: If no further changes need to be made, click Finish on the ribbon to complete the processing for this PQM.

trans-unit.source: Review Job Budget Calculation Line

seg-source.mrk: Review Job Budget Calculation Line

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to review the changes to the Job Budget Calculation line:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to review the changes to the Job Budget Calculation line:

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the PQM page.

trans-unit.source:
Refresh the Job Budget Calculation page, if necessary. Notice that the:
  • Vendor No. = 62000
  • Direct Unit Cost = 48.50

seg-source.mrk: Refresh the Job Budget Calculation page, if necessary.
Notice that the:
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Vendor No.
• Direct Unit Cost = 48.50

trans-unit.source: : Updated Job Budget Calculation line for item D-7014

seg-source.mrk: : Updated Job Budget Calculation line for item D-7014

trans-unit.source: To access the PQM again at any time for this Job Budget Calculation line, click Show PQM on the Navigate FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: To access the PQM again at any time for this Job Budget Calculation line, click Show PQM on the Navigate FastTab.

trans-unit.source: : PQM page reopened from Job Budget Calculation line

seg-source.mrk: : PQM page reopened from Job Budget Calculation line

trans-unit.source: As previously noted, the quotes can be deleted or kept, depending on the company’s business processes for procurement.

seg-source.mrk: As previously noted, the quotes can be deleted or kept, depending on the company’s business processes for procurement.
